mapper.sql: select FEEDBACK_MEETINGS_ID, PLAN_ID, UNITS_ID, MEETINGS_NAME, MEETINGS_TIME, VENUE, PARTICIPANTS_ID, PARTICIPANTS_NAME, MEETINGS_CONTENT, CREATED_BY, CREATED_TIME, UPDATED_BY, UPDATED_TIME, ENT_ID, APPROVER_ID, APPROVER_NAME, APPROVAL_FLAG from inspection_feedback_meetings
mapper.select: select u.UNITS_ID,u.ORG_ID,u.ORG_NAME,u.created_time,count(d.UNITS_ID) as count from inspection_units u left join inspection_feedback_meetings d on u.UNITS_ID = d.UNITS_ID where u.plan_id = #{planId} group by u.UNITS_ID

select FEEDBACK_MEETINGS_ID, PLAN_ID, UNITS_ID, MEETINGS_NAME, MEETINGS_TIME, VENUE, PARTICIPANTS_ID, PARTICIPANTS_NAME, MEETINGS_CONTENT, f.CREATED_BY as 'f.CREATED_BY ', f.CREATED_TIME as 'f.CREATED_TIME', f.UPDATED_BY as 'f.UPDATED_BY', f.UPDATED_TIME as 'f.UPDATED_TIME', f.ENT_ID as 'f.ENT_ID', APPROVER_ID, APPROVER_NAME, APPROVAL_FLAG, doc.PIIS_DOC_ID, doc.OBJECT_ID, doc.FILE_DICT_ID, doc.FILE_NAME, doc.FILE_SIZE, doc.FILE_PATH from inspection_feedback_meetings f left join piis_document doc on concat('FeedbackMeetings', f.FEEDBACK_MEETINGS_ID) = doc.OBJECT_ID where f.FEEDBACK_MEETINGS_ID = #{feedbackMeetingsId}
